leg.transformationDescription:
A layer of beaver-like fur quickly grows over [npc.her] legs as they shift into a new form. As [npc.her] new fur spreads down to the ends of [npc.her] toes, some webbing starts to connect them, and tough leathery pads grow to cover [npc.her] soles, leaving [npc.herHim] with paw-like feet. As the transformation ends, [npc.she] [npc.verb(see)] that [npc.her] new fur smoothly transitions into the [npc.skin] covering the rest of [npc.her] body at [npc.her] upper-thigh.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] anthropomorphic, [style.bolddarkBrown(beaver-like legs and feet)], which are [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.legFullDescription].
